description:
log/syslog: minor doc fixes.

Fixes issue 2798.

messages.text:
http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go
File src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go#newcode33
src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go:33: // Writer is a connection to a syslog server.
Somebody correct me if I am wrong but doc comments on a type usually begin with an indefinite article. Revert this part?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go
File src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go#newcode151
src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go:151: // as is to Logger. All messages are logged with Priority p.
NewLogger creates a log.Logger that wites to Syslog with priority p.
The flag argument controls the message format (see the log package for details). It is passed as-is to log.New.

PTAL

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go
File src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go#newcode33
src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go:33: // Writer is a connection to a syslog server.
On 2012/02/01 07:49:27, bsiegert wrote:
> Somebody correct me if I am wrong but doc comments on a type usually begin with
> an indefinite article. Revert this part?

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609046/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go#newcode151
src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go:151: // as is to Logger. All messages are logged with Priority p.
On 2012/02/01 02:21:39, adg wrote:
> NewLogger creates a log.Logger that wites to Syslog with priority p.
> The flag argument controls the message format (see the log package for details).
> It is passed as-is to log.New.

Done, except for "wites" :).

subject: code review 5609046: log/syslog: minor doc fixes.
